noteR.para: To avoid all risk of damage to the systems, apply the safety and cleanliness instructions and operation recommendations before carrying out any repair engine : precautions for the repair GIEMR-001545 .
It is strictly forbidden to apply any pressure to the engine oil sump. Damage to the sump may also damage the engine by:

ul.li: blocking the strainer,
raising the oil level above maximum, with a risk of engine racing.

procstep.para: Remove the engine - gearbox assembly engine and gearbox assembly : removal - refitting GIEMR-001096 .
Disconnect the manual gearbox from the engine gearbox assembly : removal - refitting GIEMR-000921 (21A, Manual gearbox).
Disconnect the automatic gearbox from the engine gearbox assembly : removal - refitting GIEMR-000921 (23A, Automatic transmission).
Remove the accessories belt accessories belt : removal - refitting GIEMR-000720 .
Remove the accessories belt accessories belt : removal - refitting GIEMR-000720 .
Fit the flywheel locking tool Flywheel locking tool. Mot. 1677 onto the cylinder block.
Remove the crankshaft accessories pulley crankshaft accessories pulley : removal - refitting GIEMR-001655 .
Remove the crankshaft accessories pulley accessories belt : removal - refitting GIEMR-000720 .
Remove:

ul.li: the clutch disc and pressure plate clutch plate : removal - refitting GIEMR-000661 (20A, Clutch),
the flywheel flywheel : removal - refitting GIEMR-002431 .

procstep.para: Remove the drive plate drive plate : removal - refitting GIEMR-002387 .
Remove the flywheel locking tool Flywheel locking tool. Mot. 1677 .
Place the engine on the component support component support equipment : use GIEMR-001522 .
Drain the engine engine oil : draining - refilling GIEMR-001296 .
Drain the engine engine oil : draining - refilling GIEMR-001296 .
Remove:

ul.li: the timing belt timing belt : removal - refitting GIEMR-000726 ,
the alternator alternator : removal - refitting GIEMR-000049 .

procstep.para: Remove the air conditioning compressor air conditioning compressor : removal - refitting GIEMR-000616 (62A, Air conditioning).
Remove the power-assisted steering pump power-assisted steering pump : removal - refitting GIEMR-001674 (36B, Power-assisted steering).
Remove:

ul.li: the multifunction support multifunction support : removal - refitting GIEMR-001996 ,
the inlet distributor intake distributor : removal - refitting GIEMR-002040 ,
the oil decanter oil decanter : removal - refitting GIEMR-000833 ,
the ignition coils ignition coil : removal - refitting GIEMR-000270 ,
the rocker cover rocker cover : removal - refitting GIEMR-000738 ,
the camshafts cylinder head : stripping - rebuilding GIEMR-000743 ,
the cylinder head cylinder head : removal - refitting GIEMR-000741 ,
the crankshaft seal on the timing side crankshaft seal, timing end : removal - refitting GIEMR-001325 .

procstep.para: Remove:

ul.li: the crankshaft closure panel bolts1,
the crankshaft closure panel2,
the gearbox side crankshaft seal crankshaft seal, gearbox side : removal - refitting GIEMR-001324 ,
the sump engine oil sump : removal - refitting GIEMR-000475 ,
the oil pump engine oil pump : removal - refitting GIEMR-001687 ,
the con rod - piston assemblies from each cylinder piston - con rod : removal - refitting GIEMR-001762 .

procstep.para: Check that the markings made in the factory on the crankshaft bearing caps are legible (bearing 1 on the flywheel end).

noteR.para: Do not use a punch or an etching tool to mark the con rod caps to match their bodies, to prevent incipient breakage of the con rod.
Use an indelible marker pen.

procstep.para: Mark:

ul.li: the crankshaft bearing caps using an indelible marker pen, if necessary,
the direction of fitting of the crankshaft bearing caps.

noteR.para: Note:
Always mark the position of each crankshaft bearing shell using an indelible marker pen, in relation to the crankshaft bearing number.

procstep.para: Remove:

ul.li: the crankshaft bearing cap bolts,
the crankshaft bearing caps,
the crankshaft,
the crankshaft bearing shells,
the crankshaft thrust washers.

noteR.para: To ensure proper sealing, the sealing surfaces of the cylinder block and bearing cap number 1 must be clean, dry and free from grease (no finger marks).
Note:
Avoid any impact or use for support on:
-the mating faces of the seal and bearing of the crankshaft or cylinder block,
-the mating faces of the crankshaft bearing caps.

procstep.para:
Clean withSurface Cleaner
vehicle : parts and consumables for the repair GIEMR-002445 :

ul.li: the crankshaft,
the crankshaft bearing caps,
the mating faces of the crankshaft journal bearing shells on the cylinder block,
the mating faces of the crankshaft bearing caps on the cylinder block.

noteR.para: Wear goggles with side protectors for this operation.

procstep.para: Dry the parts using acompressed air nozzle.

procedure.title: Preparation for refitting if replacing the crankshaft

procstep.para: When replacing the crankshaft or crankshaft bearing shells, always identify the thickness class for each bearing shell that will be refitted on each crankshaft bearing, to ensure that the journal clearances remain within the tolerances, before refitting the crankshaft crankshaft : check GIEMR-002403 .

noteR.para: Note:
Any clearances of the crankshaft journal outside the tolerances can cause engine damage.

procstep.para: Fit the grooved bearing shells onto all of the cylinder block crankshaft bearings.
On the bearing caps, fit grooved bearing shells to bearing caps 2-4 and non-grooved bearing shells to bearing caps 1-3-5 .
Fit the tool Crankshaft bearing tool. Mot. 1493-01 on the cylinder block.
Insert the bearing shell into tool Crankshaft bearing tool. Mot. 1493-01 .
Press at3until the bearing shell comes into contact with the tab4.
Fit the Crankshaft bearing tool. Mot. 1493-01 on the bearing cap.
Insert the bearing shell into tool Crankshaft bearing tool. Mot. 1493-01 .
Press at5until the bearing shell comes into contact with the tab6.
Check the crankshaft diametric clearance value crankshaft : check GIEMR-002403 .
Clean off of any remaining parts of the measuring wire on the crankshaft and bearing shells.
Oil the crankshaft bearings (only the surface that comes into contact with the crankshaft).
Refit:

ul.li: the crankshaft,
the crankshaft thrust washers on bearing 3 (grooves at crankshaft end).

procstep.para: Check for crankshaft thrust washers on bearing 3 (grooves on the crankshaft end).

noteR.para: To ensure proper sealing, the sealing surfaces of the cylinder block and bearing cap number 1 must be clean, dry and free from grease (no finger marks).
Applying excess sealant could cause it to be squeezed out when parts are tightened. A mixture of sealant and fluid could damage certain components (engine, radiator, etc.).
Applying excess sealant could cause it to be squeezed out when parts are tightened. A mixture of sealant and fluid could damage certain components (engine, radiator, etc.).

procstep.para:
Apply two beads7ofMastixo
vehicle : parts and consumables for the repair GIEMR-002445 with a width of 1 mm on bearing number 1 .
Refit the crankshaft bearing caps placing cap 1 on the flywheel end.

Torque and angle tighten in order the crankshaft bearing cap bolts
25 N.m + 47˚ ± 5˚
.
Check the crankshaft lateral play crankshaft : check GIEMR-002403 .
Check that the crankshaft turns freely, with no hard point.
Refit:

ul.li: the "piston - con rod" assembly on every cylinder piston - con rod : removal - refitting GIEMR-001762 ,
the oil pump engine oil pump : removal - refitting GIEMR-001687 ,
the sump engine oil sump : removal - refitting GIEMR-000475 ,
the gearbox side crankshaft seal crankshaft seal, gearbox side : removal - refitting GIEMR-001324 .

noteR.para: To ensure proper sealing, the gasket surfaces must be clean, dry and not greasy (avoid any finger marks).
Applying excess sealant could cause it to be squeezed out when parts are tightened. A mixture of sealant and fluid could damage certain components (engine, radiator, etc.).
Note:

The closure cover can be sealed with a seal or usingRESIN ADHESIVE
vehicle : parts and consumables for the repair GIEMR-002445 .

procstep.para: If the crankshaft closure panel is sealed usingRESIN ADHESIVE, the bead must be 1 mm wide and applied in accordance with the diagram.
Refit the crankshaft closure panel.

Tighten to torque and in order the crankshaft closure panel bolts
12 N.m
.
Refit the crankshaft seal on the timing end crankshaft seal, timing end : removal - refitting GIEMR-001325 .
Refit:

ul.li: the cylinder head cylinder head : removal - refitting GIEMR-000741 ,
the camshafts cylinder head : stripping - rebuilding GIEMR-000743 ,
the rocker cover rocker cover : removal - refitting GIEMR-000738 ,
the ignition coils ignition coil : removal - refitting GIEMR-000270 ,
the oil decanter oil decanter : removal - refitting GIEMR-000833 ,
the inlet distributor intake distributor : removal - refitting GIEMR-002040 ,
the multifunction support multifunction support : removal - refitting GIEMR-001996 .

procstep.para: Refit the power-assisted steering pump power-assisted steering pump : removal - refitting GIEMR-001674 (36B, Power-assisted steering).
Refit the air conditioning compressor air conditioning compressor : removal - refitting GIEMR-000616 (62A, Air conditioning).
Refit:

ul.li: the alternator alternator : removal - refitting GIEMR-000049 ,
the timing belt timing belt : removal - refitting GIEMR-000726 .

procstep.para: Remove the engine from the component support component support equipment : use GIEMR-001522 .
Refit:

ul.li: the clutch disc and pressure plate clutch plate : removal - refitting GIEMR-000661 (20A, Clutch),
the flywheel flywheel : removal - refitting GIEMR-002431 .

procstep.para: Refit the drive plate drive plate : removal - refitting GIEMR-002387 .
Refit:

ul.li: the flywheel locking tool Flywheel locking tool. Mot. 1677 on the cylinder block,
the crankshaft accessories pulley crankshaft accessories pulley : removal - refitting GIEMR-001655 .

procstep.para: Refit:

ul.li: the flywheel locking tool Flywheel locking tool. Mot. 1677 on the cylinder block,
the crankshaft accessories pulley accessories belt : removal - refitting GIEMR-000720 .

procstep.para: Remove the flywheel locking tool Flywheel locking tool. Mot. 1677 from the cylinder block.
Refit the accessories belt accessories belt : removal - refitting GIEMR-000720 .
Refit the accessories belt accessories belt : removal - refitting GIEMR-000720 .
Connect the manual gearbox to the engine gearbox assembly : removal - refitting GIEMR-000921 (21A, Manual gearbox).
Connect the automatic gearbox to the engine gearbox assembly : removal - refitting GIEMR-000921 (23A, Automatic transmission).
Refit the engine - gearbox assembly engine and gearbox assembly : removal - refitting GIEMR-001096 .
Top up the engine oil engine oil : draining - refilling GIEMR-001296 .
Top up the engine oil engine oil : draining - refilling GIEMR-001296 .
